net.proteusframework.cms

Interface PageElementModel<PE extends PageElement>

  • Type Parameters:
    PE - the PageElement type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    net.proteusframework.core.locale.OptionallyLocalizedNamedObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PageElementModelImpl

    public interface PageElementModel<PE extends PageElement>
extends net.proteusframework.core.locale.OptionallyLocalizedNamedObject
    Represents a Component in CMS.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • getEditor

        @Nullable
<T> T getEditor(Class<T> editorType)
        Get the editor for the component.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the editor type.
        Parameters:
        editorType - the editor type.
        Returns:
        an instance of the specified editor type or null if an editor of that type is unsupported.

      • getIcon

        net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.FactoryBasedResource getIcon()
        Get the icon for the Component. For base components this will be PageElement.getIcon().
        Returns:
        the icon.

      • getIdentifier

        String getIdentifier()
        Get the unique identifier of a component.

        For example, a ScriptingBean has this identifier: "com.i2rd.cms.bean.ScriptingBean". A ScriptingBean virtual component for the Foo script would have this identifier: "com.i2rd.cms.bean.ScriptingBean:/1234". In the second case, the 1234 identifies the Library for the Foo script.

        The identifier must be locale neutral and the Component editor must enforce that.

        Returns:
        the identifier.

      • getName

        net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocalizedText getName(net.proteusframework.core.locale.LocaleContext localeContext)
        Get the name of the Component.
        Specified by:
        getName in interface net.proteusframework.core.locale.OptionallyLocalizedNamedObject
        Parameters:
        localeContext - the locale context.
        Returns:
        the name. Never null.

      • getProvider

        PageElementModelFactory<PE> getProvider()
        Get the provider.
        Returns:
        the provider.

      • isBaseComponent

        boolean isBaseComponent()
        Test if this is a Base component.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • supportsLabels

        boolean supportsLabels()
        Test if this component supports labels. Implementations should default to false.
        Returns:
        true or false.
